ComicInfo.Summary:
Chuck Palahniuk writes the sequel to Fight Club!
For the past decade Tyler Durden’s been sneaking out of Sebastian’s subconscious. Sebastian has a nice wife and a nice kid. He has a nice home in the suburbs. Nice-enough neighbors. Now all that’s going up like so much potassium permanganate.
Rize or Die!
One of IGN and io9’s Most Anticipated Comics of 2015!
Variant cover by Francesco Francavilla!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | David Mack | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | Var | FOC Ultra Variant Cover | David Mack | 3 | Note: The Regular cover is a homage of Grant Wood's American Gothic painting.
